attributes.action: remove the pension tax-grab of his chancellorship and allow the pensions industry to return to normal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the annual tax grab instituted by the prime minister when he was chancellor should be reversed and all "civil" service pension provisions should be made the same as private and commmercial pensions including the retirement age of 65 for men and 60 for women.
